Newest Hero!
Brewmaster
Login - Register - Feedback
This site is currently in beta stages of development. Some bugs may be present or data missing, if you notice anything wrong or have suggestions for improvements please let us know via the feedback forum or the contact page. All data available is based on the Dota 2 test version and any data mistakes that appear in-game will also appear here. At this stage taking any data found here as 100% accurate is not recommended. Major notes: Cosmetic items are in very early form and armor % damage reduction calculations on hero tooltips do not match in-game values.
